doc.field: john feehery, now you're talking, showing intelligence at the end of the conversation. i'm just kidding. you're normally not this good. republican congressman paul broun says president obama is upholding the soviet union's constitution. is there one? i don't think there's a soviet union anymore. we're back on 'hardball,' the place for politics. global warming is a total hoax, and i'll tell you how i know. because it's cold today where i live.
